sourcesContent:
{{'$' + (chart.percent * 100).toFixed(0)}}
{{chart.day}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Chart } from '../models/Chart'; import { ChartService } from '../services/chart.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-chart', templateUrl: './chart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./chart.component.scss'], }) export class ChartComponent implements OnInit { boolPopin: boolean = false; charts!: Chart[]; percent = 0.75; color = 'yellow'; constructor(private chartService: ChartService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.charts = [ { id: 1, percent: 0.25, day: 'mon' }, { id: 2, percent: 0.55, day: 'tue' }, { id: 3, percent: 0.45, day: 'wed' }, { id: 4, percent: 0.25, day: 'thu' }, { id: 5, percent: 0.1, day: 'fri' }, { id: 6, percent: 0.9, day: 'sat' }, { id: 7, percent: 0.8, day: 'sun' }, ]; let arr = []; for (let index = 0; index < array.length; index++) { const element = array[index]; } const max = Math.max(); } showPopin(index: number) { this.boolPopin = true; } }
